snippet: Pete Rose was banished from baseball for gambling, but is still one of the game’s greats.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Kostya Kennedy, assistant managing editor at Sports Illustrated, urges the Baseball Hall of Fame to allow Pete Rose to be considered for induction; contends it is unfair that Rose's banishment persists while players like Barry Bonds and Roger Clemens are considered, despite their use of performance-enhancing drugs.
lead_paragraph: Pete Rose was banished from baseball for gambling, but is still one of the game’s greats.

headline.main: Give Rose a Shot at the Hall
headline.print_headline: Give Rose a Shot at the Hall
